mapper.select: select * from parent p left join (select p_no from family where ch_no=#{chNo}) f on p.p_no = f.p_no join member m on p.m_no = m.m_no where m.m_type=3 and k_no=#{kNo} and f.p_no is null;
select * from family f join children ch on f.ch_no=ch.ch_no join parent p on f.p_no=p.p_no join member m on p.m_no=m.m_no where ch.ch_no=#{chNo} order by m.m_name
mapper.delete: delete from family where p_no=#{pNo} and ch_no=#{chNo}
